resp = client.connector.update_features(
    connector_id="my-connector",
    features={
        "document_level_security": {
            "enabled": True
        },
        "incremental_sync": {
            "enabled": True
        },
        "sync_rules": {
            "advanced": {
                "enabled": False
            },
            "basic": {
                "enabled": True
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
